attributes.action: Remove the 5% VAT on all domestic fuel bills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once again this government is sitting back and watching the greedy power companies and its share holders rip the uk public off with unfair index linked price increases,previous governments have ignored the fact that we are reaching crisis point with energy supplies but have done nothing,its now time for the public to make a stand to stop this madness,sign this petition now and make this deaf government listen thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
